code: /**  * Retrieves for the given query service path a {@link MetricQueryServiceGateway}.  *  * @param queryServicePath under which the QueryService can be reached  * @return Future containing the resolved QueryServiceGateway  */ CompletableFuture<MetricQueryServiceGateway> retrieveService(String queryServicePath).
